fields.name: CS4HS 2017
fields.description: The event is a collection of workshops focused on preparing New Zealand educators for teaching the computer science and programming achievement standards for NCEA. We have received funding for this event through Google's CS4HS Grant Program, and through other generous sponsors, and are running the workshops over three days from the 6th to 8th of December 2017, with optional programming workshops occurring on the 4th and 5th of December.

fields.name: Computer Science in Primary Schools (Oct 2017)
fields.description: This workshop is for absolute beginners to Computer Science to those who have been dabbling and teaching in their schools. We'll be focusing on the new Digital Technologies Curriculum and integrating Computational Thinking into your classroom programme.

fields.name: Computer Science in Primary Schools (Jan 2017)
fields.description: This workshop is for absolute beginners to Computer Science to those who have been dabbling and teaching in their schools. We'll be focusing on the new Digital Technologies Curriculum and integrating Computational Thinking into your classroom programme.
